overview: Get to know Aerosmith like never before with this profile that covers the band's 30-year history. Interviews with front man Steven Tyler and others are interspersed with behind-the-scenes and concert footage of some of the group's biggest hits. Songs include "Love in an Elevator," "Dude (Looks Like a Lady)," "Walk This Way," "Livin' on the Edge" and more.
title: Aerosmith in Performance
